mapper.select: select if(friendship_is_black = 0, 0, 1) as status from `im-system`.im_friendship where app_id = #{appId} and friendship_from_id = #{fromId} and friendship_to_id = #{toId}

select ( case when a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 then 0 when a.status = 0 and b.status = 0 then 1 when a.status = 1 and b.status = 0 then 2 when a.status = 0 and b.status = 1 then 3 end ) as status from (select if(friendship_is_black = 0, 0, 1) as status -- 校验从左到右的拉黑关系 from `im-system`.im_friendship where app_id = #{appId} and friendship_from_id = #{fromId} and friendship_to_id = #{toId}) as a inner join (select if(friendship_is_black = 0, 0, 1) as status -- 校验从右到左的拉黑关系 from `im-system`.im_friendship where app_id = #{appId} and friendship_from_id = #{toId} and friendship_to_id = #{fromId}) as b
